ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats the arguement?
ygData.msgSnippet: because, adding a warrior, rogue, monk, or cleric is going to be more useful than a bard helping some wizards med.  also, all our wizards will be oom and
ygData.messageBody:
because, adding a warrior, rogue, monk, or cleric is going to be more useful
than a bard helping some wizards med. also, all our wizards will be oom and
barely have put a dent in the 500K HP of one of these mobs, and will be
using their no mana lure items like VP staff anyway.

Shada

> I have never fought what is now an "uber mob". However,
> according to people
> on this list (and others) they take in the range of 10
> minutes to kill.
> Which means med times matter. SO why wouldn't having a bard
> in the wizard
> group be useful?
